channel.title: Hi I'm Ivan Lopez from AB Press Optimizer
channel.description:
Hi Everyone,
I'm Ivan the founder of AB Press Optimizer. I am web developer for an Online Media company in florida. Im a big fan of the Bootstrapped podcast. Today is actualy the launch to my first product [AB Press Optimizer][1] a WordPress plugin for A/B Testing. Is it just me or do you always feel nevourse when your turn the switch. I look forward to sharing the ups and downs to my first product lauch.
[1]: http://abpressoptimizer.com

item.title: Hi I'm Ivan Lopez from AB Press Optimizer
item.dc:creator: IvanDevelop
item.description:
Thank You and you did an awesome job on snappy love the interface hopefully I can grow this so I can start using snappy for support.

Read full topic
